static SyncNodeElement org.ccnx.ccn.impl.sync.NodeBuilder.getFirstOrLast ( SyncNodeComposite  snc,
SyncNodeCache  cache,
boolean  first 
) [static]

Get the first or last leaf element of an arbitrary node given a cache.

If we can't trace all the way back to the leaf, return null.

Parameters:
snc the beginning node
cache 
first if true looking for first
Returns:
SyncTreeEntry org.ccnx.ccn.impl.sync.NodeBuilder.newLeafNode ( TreeSet< ContentName >  names,
SyncHashCache  shc,
SyncNodeCache  cache 
)

Create a new leaf node from the names entered.

We use only as many names as will fit into the node, and remove those names from the input list so that after this has completed, the list contains the remaining names which are not yet in a node.

Parameters:
names - the set of names in canonical order
Returns:

Returns:
entry for the new node or null if none

final SyncHashCache  shc,
SyncNodeCache  cache,
int  depth 
)

Create a node of nodes from the input map.

We use only as many nodes as will fit into the new node and remove those from the list.

Parameters:
nodes
